job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Typetone's AI technology already yields significant efficiency returns for our customers. However, large language models are a new type of intelligence, and the art of instructing them in a way that delivers the best results is still in its infancy - it's a hybrid between programming, instructing, and teaching. You will figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks, but even more important: custom train models to our customer's needs.

   Given that the field of prompt-engineering is arguably less than 2 years old, this is a brand new position in which you learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world! If you have existing projects that demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models, we'd love to see them. If you haven't done much in the way of prompt engineering yet, you can best demonstrate your prompt engineering skills by spending some time experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.

   Representative Projects
     * Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers.
     * Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers.
     * Helping in modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models.
job_details.full_text:
Prompt/Modelling Engineer Intern

Typetone's AI technology already yields significant efficiency returns for our customers. However, large language models are a new type of intelligence, and the art of instructing them in a way that delivers the best results is still in its infancy - it's a hybrid between programming, instructing, and teaching. You will figure out the best methods of prompting our AI to accomplish a wide range of tasks, but even more important: custom train models to our customer's needs.

   Given that the field of prompt-engineering is arguably less than 2 years old, this is a brand new position in which you learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world! If you have existing projects that demonstrate prompt engineering or custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models, we'd love to see them. If you haven't done much in the way of prompt engineering yet, you can best demonstrate your prompt engineering skills by spending some time experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts.

   Representative Projects
     * Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers.
     * Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers.
     * Helping in modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with large language models (LLMs), custom training models, prompt engineering, and building applications around generative AI. This aligns directly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in areas like advanced prompt engineering, fine-tuning LLMs, and developing user-facing systems. While there's a mention of 'modelling', the context is specifically generative models and LLMs, not traditional predictive modeling.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'custom train models to our customer's needs', 'custom modelling on LLMs', and 'custom trained models', which directly relates to adapting and training generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: custom train models to our customer's needs

job_tasks.justification: The role involves figuring out 'the best methods of prompting our AI' and experimenting with 'ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models' to get 'complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts', which is the core of prompt engineering for generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: best methods of prompting our AI

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models', indicating direct work with generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: custom modelling on LLMs or image generation models

job_tasks.justification: The role involves building 'a set of tutorials and interactive tools that teach the art of prompt engineering to our customers', which requires software development to create user-facing educational content.
job_tasks.phrase: Build a set of tutorials and interactive tools

job_tasks.justification: The task 'Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers' requires understanding customer needs and aligning AI capabilities to business objectives.
job_tasks.phrase: Discover, test, and document best practices for a wide range of tasks relevant to our customers

job_tasks.justification: Helping in 'modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models' is a specific task related to fine-tuning generative models for specific output characteristics.
job_tasks.phrase: modelling the tone of voice of our customers in their custom trained models

soft_skills.phrase: learn invaluable lessons in an industry that is changing the world!
figure out the best methods of prompting our AI
experimenting with ChatGPT models or GPT3.5 custom models and showing that you've managed to get complex behaviours from a series of well crafted prompts
